articles.title: SBI stock climbs 33% in less than 3 months, Motilal Oswal sees further 15% upside; here's why | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Shares of State Bank of India (SBI) have surged nearly 17% this month, marking its largest monthly gain since January 2022. The stock has risen approximately 33% since December, demonstrating robust growth in less than three months.
